casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Dontail BRINKLEY No. 394P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Michele A. Goldman, Attorney at Law, for Brinkley, Dontail. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of November 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 21st of November 2017 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of December 2017 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
